Exam Schedule

STAT 100 Exam Schedule Spring 2020

Important Info: There will be three midterm exams and a comprehensive final exam. There will be NO makeup exams and NO formula sheets may be used on any exam. If you miss an exam and have written proof of a valid reason, then we will substitute your final exam score for the missed exam.

STAT 100 Exam 1

Keys:
  • Stat Key
  • Stats Key
  • Statistics Key
  • STAT Key

Date: Wednesday, February 12th, 2020

Time: 7:00-8:30pm

Covers: Chapter 1-Chapter 6 Part 1

Keys:

STAT 100 Exam 3

Date: Wednesday, April 15th, 2020

Time: 12:00am-9:00pm

Covers: Chapters 13-19

Final Exam

  • I use the final exam time assigned to our class by the university.
  • See Official University Final Exams Schedules and Policies.
  • The final cumulative for Chapters 1-24 (ALL chapters in notebook)

We are dedicated to helping students on the U of I campus learn and understand basic statistical concepts so they can understand and make sense of things that are interesting or important to them.
